name: prism-scale
effect: Held by feebas : Holder evolves into milotic when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Feebas: Holder evolves into Milotic.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A mysterious scale that causes a certain Pokémon to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A mysterious scale that causes a certain Pokémon to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A mysterious scale that causes a certain Pokémon to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.
